author: buscob
msg: Remove unused ListPortalPage.groovy. This has been replaced by the PortalPageWorker.getPortalPages method

author: buscob
msg: - Moved method getPortalPages from ModelMenuItem to the PortalPageWorker. This is a method that generally retrieves all PortalPages that have a common parent. It will be re-used in a next commit.
- Added method to the PortalPageWorker to retrieve a PortalPage considering if a private derived copy exists for the current user (will be used in a next commit)
- Added method to the PortalPageWorker to check if the current user is allowed to configure a PortalPage.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3088 TestAvroServer and TestThriftServer broken because use same table in all tests and tests enable/disable/delete; adding mention to CHANGES.txt

author: stack
msg: HBASE-2968 No standard family filter provided

author: buscob
msg: - No need to calculate sequenceNumMin and sequenceNumMax. Native form widget itemIndex and listSize can do the job.
- Disabled form pagination. We want all PortalPages in one list to set their ordering.
